item.title: Parry Nightmare coming to Switch on June 25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/parry-nightmare-coming-to-switch-on-june-25

  • Switch

Currently available for PC.

Publisher Phoenixx and developer KAKUKAKU GAMES will release “parry-and-buddy action” game Parry Nightmare for Switch via Nintendo eShop on June 25 for $6.99, the companies announced. Pre-orders are available now at a 10 percent-off discount price of $6.29.

Parry Nightmare first launched for PC via Steam on March 22, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo eShop:

Easy to pick up, and hard to put down! Parry Nightmare is a one-of-a-kind “parry heaven” action game where the best offense is a good defense!

Team up with your “other self,” Honno-chan, as you parry, pummel and pulse your way out of your darkest nightmare in this one-of-a-kind “parry heaven” action game!

Use your nightmare’s strength against it with your trusty parry move! Stun foes, send away projectiles, and stop threats right in their tracks by chaining parries!

Honno-chan will defeat any foes you stun automatically. Leave them to her and focus on the defense!

Parrying grants your soul more and more courage to face the night! Heal up by continuing to parry! Spend excess soul to unleash a powerful Burst move to wipe out hordes of enemies at once!

Collect powerups from rare foes to supercharge Honno-chan! Breathe fire, deploy orbital pain, wreak havoc, and more!

Defeated enemies drop light. Collect light and the darkness of the nightmare abates, giving you a clearer view of the chaos. Max out your light meter to beat the nightmare!

Will you be able to escape the nightmare and greet a new day…?

item.title: Visual novel Ending the Happy Route launches October 2 in Japan for PS5, PS4, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/visual-novel-ending-the-happy-route-launches-october-2-in-japan-for-ps5-ps4-switch-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

From Kemco and Water Phoenix.

Visual novel Ending the Happy Route will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on October 2 in Japan for 3,300 yen, publisher Kemco and developer Water Phoenix announced.

In Japan, a physical edition will also be available for PlayStation 5 for 3,960 yen. Pre-orders are available now at Japanese retailers.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A visual novel depicting a protagonist who desperately struggles to change their fate of despair.

Gameplay

This game is a visual novel where you progress through the story. The story unfolds based on the choices presented during the game.

Story

The protagonist, Hyoga, had a life where his chosen actions never seemed to pay off, ever since his childhood. As a high school student with a rough personality, Ayuno, a classmate, treats him kindly. However, Hyoga ends up making unintended choices towards Ayuno.
